question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. white parking sign
B. yellow sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white parking sign is on a pole near the sidewalk in the foreground, while the yellow sign is further down the street, making their relative depth very obvious from the image.
